ProcessTemplates.Name: XML to JSON - Transform and convert data
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process reads an XML file from the local fileshare, optionally transforms the contents using an XSLT stylesheet, and then converts the contents into JSON format and writes the created JSON back to the local fileshare.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/file.xml\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path to the input XML file, including the filename."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/output.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path to the target file, including the filename."},"XsltScript":{"Value":"\"<xsl:stylesheet>...</xsl:stylesheet>\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Optional. The XSLT script to be used to transform the XML file before converting it into JSON. For the conversion to JSON to work, the script should define method=\"xml\" in the <xsl:output/> tag."}}

Process.Name: XML to JSON - Transform and convert data
Process.Description: This template process reads an XML file from the local fileshare, optionally transforms the contents using an XSLT stylesheet, and then converts the contents into JSON format and writes the created JSON back to the local fileshare.
